::Skulletron::

        Skulletron got hit by Klant's missile, and flew bac=
kwards, and hit the wall, then fell down to the ground in a sitting positio=
n against the wall.

         Then, Skulletron's chest was continuously pou=
nded by 25 shots from Torca.

         Mechfluid leaked from all over Skull=
etron, he was almost completely covered in it.  Skulletron got up.

       =
 "I........." Skulletron coughed up mechfluid, "I'll kill you....." He spat=
 out more mechfluid, "If it's...." He wiped mechfluid from his mouth, "If i=
t's.......The last.....Thing........I.......................Do........." He=
 muttered out.

          Skulletron then transformed to beast mode.

     =
    This would be his only chance to survive.

         Skulletron connecte=
d his mind with Torca and Klant's mind.

         Then, he did what he love=
d to do.

          Skulletron projected an image of himself into Torca and=
 Klant's mind.

          Then, he sent an image of Iron Raptor into their =
minds.

          Skulletron now put a voice into their heads.

          "=
Maximals.................Stop this...this....madness............Skulletron =
is not the enemy......................Iron Raptor is the true enemy........=
....................She plotted Dinobot and Tavatron getting lost..........=
.......She plotted Skulletron coming into the base...............You Maxima=
ls are blind!!!!!!  No matter how much Iron Raptor seems to be on your side=
, she will always be the enemy...............She is using you...........Spa=
re Skulletron's life, and attack the real enemy!!!!" The voice said, cold a=
nd grim.

           Skulletron projected an image of what was going to hap=
pen to all of them during a big battle, and Iron Raptor laughing maniacally=
.
